Combine data with mapping data
```{r}
#mapping data
zip_wa <- zctas(state = "WA", year = 2010)

#clean county name in VDRS data
wa_nvdrs22_comp$county<- gsub(", WA","",wa_nvdrs22_comp$ResidenceFIPS)
head(wa_nvdrs22_comp$county)

wa_nvdrs22_comp<- wa_nvdrs22_comp %>% mutate(str_to_lower(county),
                                             str_to_lower(ResidenceState))
wa_nvdrs22_comp<-wa_nvdrs22_comp %>% rename(region=ResidenceState, subregion=county, order=ResidenceZip)
head(wa_nvdrs22_comp$subregion)

wa_nvdrs22_comp$subregion <- str_to_lower(wa_nvdrs22_comp$subregion)
wa_nvdrs22_comp$region <- str_to_lower(wa_nvdrs22_comp$region)
head(wa_nvdrs22_comp$subregion)
head(wa_nvdrs22_comp$region)

#subgroup VDRS data to needed variables
suicide_cir<-c("order","region", "subregion", "IncidentYear_chr","IncidentNumber", "Sex", "RaceEthnicity_c","AgeYears_c", "Military", "RelationshipStatus", "AbstractorDeathmanner_c", "MentalHealthProblem_c", "DepressedMood_c", "AlcoholProblem_c", "MentalIllnessTreatmentCurrnt_c", "HistoryMentalIllnessTreatmnt_c", "IntimatePartnerProblem_c", "Argument_c", "SuicideThoughtHistory_c", "SuicideAttemptHistory_c", "HistorySelfHarm_c", "SuicideIntentDisclosed_c", "DisclosedToIntimatePartner_c", "DisclosedToOtherFamilyMember_c", "DisclosedToHealthCareWorker_c", "DisclosedToFriend_c", "DisclosedToNeighbor_c", "DisclosedToSocialMedia_c", "SuicideNote_c", "PhysicalHealthProblem_c", "JobProblem_c", "FinancialProblem_c", "SchoolProblem_c", "EvictionOrLossOfHome_c", "WeaponType1")

#suicide only data
wa_nvdrs22_comp_suicidecir<-wa_nvdrs22_comp %>% 
  filter(AbstractorDeathmanner_c=="Suicide or intentional self-harm") %>% select(all_of(suicide_cir))

```
